channel.title: Reproducibility on Data Science Garage
channel.description: Recent content in Reproducibility on Data Science Garage

item.title: 3.1 Best Practices for Reproducibility
item.description: Analysing data using R can generate complex scripts that might make sense to you while you’re actively working on them, but they won’t to future you or collaborators. This module offers guidance on best practices for making your code easy to read and understand, both for yourself and others. Consistently following a set of “rules” will improve your R workflow and reduce occurrence of errors. SCRIPT Use this for the Practice exercises below
